objects.description: [APT41](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0096) used WMI in several ways, including for execution of commands via WMIEXEC as well as for persistence via [PowerSploit](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0194).(Citation: FireEye APT41 Aug 2019)

external_references.description: Fraser, N., et al. (2019, August 7). Double DragonAPT41, a dual espionage and cyber crime operation APT41. Retrieved September 23, 2019.
